website_summaries.verdict: The similar Coleman model gave the Insta-Bed a run for its money, but the adjustable firmness setting and dual pump system gives this item the edge in the end.
pros: Patented neverFLAT pump system silently keeps your airbed inflated all night
Primary pump automatically inflates and deflates your airbed in less than four minutes
Secondary neverFLAT Pump monitors and silently maintains the air pressure to your desired comfort level
Convenient auto-shutoff feature on primary pump automatically turns the pump off when the airbed is fully inflated or deflated.35 circular coils
18" height makes getting in and out of bed easy
cons: Needs an electrical outlet – not a pump – to inflate and maintain inflation, so make sure one will be available where you need it

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Quality - Do. Not. Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a good purchase until it started leaking. The seal broke literally a month after the 1 year warranty passed of course. Right where the automatic vacuum is secured in the bed the coating separated. I hardly used this bed and the seal still broke. Do not recommend purchasing, seems like it is faulty manufacturing. Spend the extra money and get a quality mattress that will last longer than a few uses. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie Monster

customer_reviews.title: I waited to write this review; I purchased a ...
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write this review; I purchased a queen version, in Jul2017, this is mid Feb2018, the bed began to leak few nites ago, around the seal where the control panel is mounted, i ran a bead of sealant around the panel & gave it a 48hr cure time, reinflated the mattress, but to no avail the seal still leaks !!! I'm 145lbs & the only one who's ever slept on the mattress...and it worked perfectly, not one problem whatsoever. I feel i deserve a replacement or a partial refund !!
customer_reviews.author: Dell

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but developed a leak after 13 months of very lite use
customer_reviews.text: Performed well for about 9 months. In that time, I had about 6 guests use it. The first pair used it for 5 days straight. It was brand new and performed flawless. After that, I had occasional overnite guests about every 4-6 weeks use it for a few days in some cases, mostly cases were just one nite. I left it set up and plugged in all the time in my guest bedroom downstairs. I bought it last year in late Feb 2016, and in March 2017 it just started leaking, all on its own, to the point where the 'neverflat' pump was always running. Some seam somewhere must have given out.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Z

customer_reviews.title: BEst airbed I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Do I like this bed? This is the 5th one I have purchased. People borrow them and don't give them back. The last time a guy borrowed my airbed I said "pay me for it now and if you return it in a week, the money is yours." Well, I had to order another bed! This bed is great because of the silent second fan. In the morning it's as full as it is when it's first filled. It's comfortable all night long. The pseudo-suede finish us is much better than the glossy plastic most beds are made by... this also means the sheets stay on better. I recommend this bed to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: CapitalGuy

customer_reviews.title: Not 1 total loss, but 3
customer_reviews.text: Here's the latest: Since the summer of 2017 we have purchased 3 Insta-bed Queen Air Mattresses with Never Flat pump. Two were purchased in 2017 and the third was purchased at a discount because the others developed unrepairable leaks. Well, this third one lasted slightly over 1 year. My wife told me this morning, "The air mattress is leaking just like the others...where the pump attaches to the mattress." The thing is these mattresses are at our summer house and have been used maybe, at most, 6 times during the summer and then deflated. Please look for another alternative if you are looking for temporary bedding for overnight guests. You'll save yourself time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Carl John

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect to last more than 18 months
customer_reviews.text: Second one in less than 2 years. Mattress is only used a few times when visiting my daughter and not everyday when there. The first mattress sprung a leak within warranty period and was promptly replaced. The replacement has developed a leak around the air pump that cannot be repaired. Pump has detached from mattress. Pump cannot put in enough air to compensate for the leak; it’s like trying to blow up a burst balloon. Comfortable and sleeps well until one morning you wake up looking like a wiener in a bun. If you can afford to replace every 6 - 18 months then by all means purchase because it’s good while it last.
customer_reviews.author: J del

customer_reviews.title: Such a bad flaw
customer_reviews.text: My gf and I bought this knowing that there were some issues with the pump outer sealant giving out. But we thought that would happen maybe like months out after using it. Its been used about 10 times since we got it and last night it started deflating quicker than usual. It wasnt until later that i saw a small gap between the inflator pump and the mattress. Small amount of air is sipping through. We used it in normal pump mode so it never got as firm as it can. Will contact and see if this is defective or if anyone else has had this problem so early on.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Rey

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for guests that DOESN'T deflate!
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by a friend. I was complaining because every time I had out-of-town visitors, I had to buy a new inflatable mattress. I live in Colorado and get quite a few visitors, and none of the Walmart air mattresses I bought could stay inflated. People would wake up halfway through the night on a delfated mattress! Not with the Insta-Bed Queen Air Mattress with Never Flat Pump! This thing, once inflated and plugged in, stays inflated. I have had it inflated for 2 months with no problems. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: It didn't last a year
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for the first 4 months. Then we didn't use it for 5 months. When we tried to use again in November, it inflated but the deflation valve didn't close. So it deflated in no time, the secondary pump was not able to make up for the loss through the open deflation valve. Nothing to do, this is simply a bad design end/or implementation. We also had a queen version of this "Never flat" mattress. We bought it two years ago. The same happened. It worked for the first season but in the second season the deflation valve didn't close. Exactly the same problem as with the twin mattress. Avoid this brand, this is a systematically defective product.
customer_reviews.author: x64

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quaility. Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this bed at first. The bed was comfortable, worked well. Not long after the year warranty ran out, the seal around where the control panel is mounted the air mattress leaks air, impossible to repair. I see several people had the same issue with poor quality leaking around the control panel. It very disappointing to hear Insta-Bed's poor customer service attitude concerning a quality issue. With as many failures that have been reported, Insta-Bed should provide some type of compensation.
customer_reviews.author: BHG308

customer_reviews.title: Excellent air mattress
customer_reviews.text: We used this air mattress as our regular bed for several weeks while we redecorated our bedroom and waited for our new bed to arrive. It was deflated and inflated several times so we could move it . It worked very well and the never flat pump operated perfectly and quietly. We used the plush setting and put one of those cheap egg crate pads under the mattress pad. The thing about air mattresses that many people don't realize is that they are cold if you don't add any padding under the sheet. I would recommend this air mattress. BTW read the instructions and don't forget to turn off the never flat pump when you go to deflate the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: htb

customer_reviews.title: JUNK FELL APART AFTER 6 uses.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased in 10/2016 to use in a spare room for a guest 11/2016. It was slept on for two nights. We used approximately three more times, maybe 6 nights total slept on. I attempted to use it tonight for a guest and the seam on the top of the built in pump has completely separated and the mattress lost its air. It has sat unused and untouched for months. I was shocked to find it had lost its air. I'm very disappointed in the lack of durability with this product. I WOULD CALL THIS MATTRESS JUNK!!! I paid $99 and should have put that toward a cheap spring mattress. Lesson learned. DO NOT BUY THIS INSTA-BED MATTRESS.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: SO DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.text: Work perfectly the first few time we used it but after about 4 uses the secondary pump that is suppose to be silent made a buzzing noise and didn't keep the bed inflated. My friends woke at 2am almost on the ground... Could have been a 5 stars review! Now let's see if the manufacturer issue a return shipping label and refunds me...
customer_reviews.author: Laura&Remy

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this product and did for the first few times ...
customer_reviews.text: Used about 5 times when the seams separated and wouldn't hold air. I really wanted to love this product and did for the first few times I had guests use it. I also noticed after reading the reviews, I never received a bag with it or a patch kit and this was bought as a brand new product. I feel like I got taken for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Jodirome

customer_reviews.title: Motor dead, no power. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought in 2014 and used for couple of days for guests at that time. After that we used yesterday and it worked fine. Today it is not powering up!! Motor is dead, no power! No red led light in secondary motor. (and yes, double checked my electrical connections, wall socket, etc) Very very disappointed. Now i have guests who need to sleep on floor without bed. Motor is completely sealed so i don't see a way to check if there is any issue in internal wiring or an easy fix. Bottom line - its dead just when it is needed the most. Money wasted. I won't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: sparkme

customer_reviews.title: Too cold.
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Holds air well. My issue is that the air in the mattress is the same temp as the room. In other words, if your room is cold so is the mattress. I have an electric blanket that keeps the side of me that’s not on the mattress warm but the side that’s on the mattress is cold. Not easy to sleep when half of your body is cold. I was constantly trying to wrap myself in the blanket to stay warm. I guess I’ll try a mattress pad to put a layer between myself and the mattress. I do have thermal sheets as well.
customer_reviews.author: where's waldo

customer_reviews.title: Best air mattress ever
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, I could sleep on this every night! Inflates and deflated quickly and easily. Simple to pack up in the storage bag. The pump that maintains inflation during the night isn't exactly "silent," but it certainly isn't loud enough to wake me up. I sleep with my head on the opposite side of the pump so it doesn't distract me from falling asleep and I can barely hear it. 10/10 would buy this product again and recommend it to friends!
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon

customer_reviews.title: Mattress material separated from plastic housing for back up pump. No way to patch.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd of these beds we bought. The first one failed after more than a year. The mattress material separated from the housing for the back up pump right above the words "never fail". We tried to glue it and patch it and nothing worked. I really liked the mattress. It was a great height and was very comfortable to sleep on, so I ordered another one. Certainly the problem we had was a fluke and would never happen again, right? Well, I've had the newest one for 7 months and it has failed at the exact same spot. It is now obvious that it is a design flaw. I sure won't be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory C. Cobb

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an air mattress as we don’t yet have an actual bed for company when they come to stay. I love this product! It blows up super quick and has an option for different firm levels. It doesn’t deflate when you lay on it over night either. You can always plug in and touch up the air if needed but all my company (who are my family and friends and are always honest with me) have said it was an enjoyable sleep while staying on this and never had an issue with it deflating. I’ve had this for years and it still holds up. To deflate, it’s super easy and quick. I would highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made Crepetation Sounds, and Began to Leak Excessively After Several Months
customer_reviews.text: The sounds it made while moving in bed were very interesting. Because it always made these sounds, it offered the advantage that I could blame the bed for my own indiscreet passing of gas. To its credit, the second slow pump was amazingly quiet and [as measured] used practically no power. But after awhile, the leak(s) grew to the point where the background pump could not keep up. After several months, I threw the bed into the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Reed White

customer_reviews.title: If I could give zero stars to the seller I would
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived and immediately I was disappointed at the appearance of the box. But I thought hey it was used it’s still probably in good shape. I was terribly wrong. After unraveling it I immediately see a big patch which seemed to be some sort of plastic wrap but I’m still optimistic so I start to inflate it. As it starts to inflate I started to notice more and more small patched holes and it started to anger me but it was still inflating as if there were no problems until it was done and all I could hear was a loud hissing coming from the large patched hole
customer_reviews.author: Jaylen F

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend - great investment and value
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! I am posting this review after owning this air mattress for over a year and having several friends stay on it. The air mattress stays inflated through the night and you have the option of having the sensor on to add air throughout the night if needed. My guests report that it is very comfortable and two people can share it without feeling like if one person moves the whole thing loses balance. It feels as close to a real mattress as any air mattress I have tried before.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Cook

customer_reviews.title: Flat on the first use
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Received my replacement mattress which had the exact same issue of not being able to hold air, and the auxiliary pump running constantly. This company seems to have some serious quality control issues. On the first use, this mattress was flat within 30 minutes of laying down on it with the added agitation of the “never flat” pump humming in my ear the entire time providing just enough air to billow up the sides of the mattress on either side of me . Returning this one and will update my review based on my experience with the replacement...
customer_reviews.author: Dave K

customer_reviews.title: Great inflatable bed! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: We recently had a guest sleep on this for 3 nights (family, he would give us true opinion) and he said he was very comfortable. He did hear the very slight noise or he guessed maybe he actually felt the hum of the motor self-inflating in the night to keep it at the comfort level. That was only night 1, the other 2 nights he didn't notice. The bed is very comfortable, easy to use, kept itself blown up and was a good price point. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Common defect
customer_reviews.text: Just like several other reviewers, about 2 years after we bought it (not used that much), the hard plastic housing for the pump separated from the soft mattress material, creating an opening for air to come out. I guess the one positive is that the "never flat" pump kept it inflated so that we didn't notice until we tried to use it. At least if it had gotten a puncture, we could have used the patch kit. The other negative is that it is just a bit too tall for bottom sheets to fit. The plastic mostly stayed in the bottom most wedge, but the sheets didn't stay put.
customer_reviews.author: tkr5

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 9 months!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed last November, and the damn thing popped a hole not even a year later! I tried to use the tape that came with it, and the hole still has air coming out of it! I don't have $100+ dollars to throw every 9 months for a bed! ): and today's a friday and I can't get any support until 8 AM Monday -_-
customer_reviews.author: Chyna D.

customer_reviews.title: this air mattress has seen regular duty for house guests looking for a more comfortable option than the sectional
customer_reviews.text: Purchased initially for relatives over the holiday season, this air mattress has seen regular duty for house guests looking for a more comfortable option than the sectional. Mattress shipped in standard cardboard box; packaging removal proved unremarkable and unboxing proceeded apace. Unfolded and inflated with the integrated pump with difficulty. Using the firm setting, pump kicked on approximately twice during my in-laws visit and was quickly done with maintenance pressure. Standard queen sheets fit beyond the level of the second seam and can obscure the pump if not careful. Topper is soft and snag-free. Deflation is equally simple though the user can provide some assistance once the integrated pump increases RPMs. Folds well and stores in provided bag.
customer_reviews.author: Harold the Heron

customer_reviews.title: Mixed bag of a bed
customer_reviews.text: This product barely makes it thru the 90-day warranty before failing either built-in pump quits and leaves you to find a hand pump and do it that way, and/or surface develops large bulges owing to internal superstructure failing (and no one is bouncing on these beds - have had more than one). The company's attitude is that these are inexpensive and thus disposable. Initially, very comfortable - good idea - but poorly executed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Eskind

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bed about 1 1/2yrs ago on the recommendation of a friend. Hers still works great. Mine was only used 3 times! Here it is a few days from Thanksgiving and I will be looking for another sleeping option. Not sure if there is even a way fix to this. I will try as I have nothing to lose. After the fact I see this is apparently an ongoing issue. Instabed, even after the 1 year warranty, needs to own this problem and offer repair or replacements
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Airbed.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress for almost a year now and it is used frequently by guests and myself when I travel. While it must be plugged into an electrical socket to inflate it will auto inflate all night due to a silent motor that runs as long as it is plugged in. You can adjust the inflation setting from plush to firm and you never have to worry about waking up to a saggy mattress. It's pretty deep so it feels like a regular mattress. I place a think blanket or mattress cover beneath the fitted sheet for added comfort. Comes with a patch kit and travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hitaffer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy used
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to Amazons description of very good condition, as well as being bagged with an approval sticker, the first thing I noticed upon opening the box was some dog hair. After unrolling the mattress to prepare to inflate, it was DISGUSTING with dirt, dander, dog and human hair as well as some small stains here and there. I vacuumed the top, but in the end decided I would never have anyone sleep on it. Shame on Amazon for such a blatant disregard to quality control for customers.
customer_reviews.author: K9

customer_reviews.title: You need this if your current air mattress deflates when you sleep on it.
customer_reviews.text: Never worry about re-inflating your air mattress in the middle of the night. How annoying is that? It's so easy to inflate and deflate. You don't even need to turn the air pump off because it does it for you. Select your comfort inflation of soft medium and firm and have a great night sleep. Packs up easy with an extra large carrying bag. You don't have to stuff it in the bag if you fold it up right. It just slips right in. For the money this is a very good never flat air mattress. Others are so much more expensive. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jasen Jones

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 3 air mattresses before this one
customer_reviews.text: My sister has been staying with me and I wanted a comfortable place for her to sleep. 3 cheaper air mattresses would be deflated before morning. She has been using this one for weeks and I works perfect. It has settings to adjust firmness. Very satisfied. Definitely work paying a little extra for. I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: cassondra crews

customer_reviews.title: $100 peice of garbage!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress and seller are a major disappointment! I'd give it 0 stars if I could. We purchased in March and didn't open it until this weekend for Thanksgiving guests, only to discover it was defective and doesn't hold air for more than an hour. I attempted to return it, but the seller denied it despite describing the issue. We now have a $100 heap of garbage we have to figure out how to dispose of. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Downey

customer_reviews.title: 5 years still going strong
customer_reviews.text: We've had this mattress 5 years this summer. We just took it away on a trip again and it still inflates quickly and the never flat pump hums along as needed to keep it firm through the night. Decided to add a review given how well it's treated us over this period. It's a comfortable tall mattress and the soft/medium/firm dial does a nice job giving flexibility. I'd recommend this as a purchase given how well it's held up over time for us. We typically use it a few times a month, so it's been inflated and deflated dozens of times.
customer_reviews.author: Drew's amazon schtuff

customer_reviews.title: Nice mattress, poor quality on pump.
customer_reviews.text: The pump hasn’t worked properly for us. The never flat side of it when the pump goes is loud and makes all kind of racket and it doesn’t inflate. The first one the pump stopped working all together and the second one we got to replace the first is loud and making a lot of noise and not properly inflating. The air mattress has only been used for when we get company.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen L Todd

customer_reviews.title: Brand new - went flat. Thumbs down.
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. I purchased this last year as a handy thing to have and it remained in the box until this past spring when I needed it. I did my research and thought this would be an easy and good value option. I've used it twice and both times while sleeping, its gone nearly flat. Yes, I've read and reread the instructions. Yes, I've had the dials in the correct spots. I assume there is a tiny hole and the "never flat" pump can't keep up with it when in use. Regardless - super disappointed I wasted my money. "Never flat"? Never worked.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Unpredictable
customer_reviews.text: It deflated in the middle of the night, and my guest ended up on the floor. It had only been slept on about 30 times since I bought it a year ago. There seemed to be no way to fix it, so I bought another one. It is a perfect option for my small den, but a huge problem when it suddenly collapses.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Excellet buy
customer_reviews.text: Just used this for visiting guests, set up fast and easy, take down fast and easy, they had a very comfortable sleep all night. No problem with keeping it inflated all night it was effortless and quiet. Tried it out myself and was pleasantly surprised at the comfort so glad my guests agreed. Lets hope this continues over time.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to conventional mattress, Came packaged well with no damage. Sleeps well, in fact quite comfy. The delivery was really fast and came in time for planned visit. Would recommend for weekend guest or even months of good sleep as everyday mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Bhappy2

customer_reviews.title: Stays inflated, as it should
customer_reviews.text: The previous inflatable bed I bought (Not this model) went flat after about two weeks. After doing some research, I came across this bed as a replacement. After a week of sleeping on it, it is holding together very well. There are no signs of obvious leaks, and the small pump smooths out the rest. The 'silent' pump is maybe a little louder than advertised, but isn't loud enough to keep me up at night. We'll see how the bed is holding up after a month. But so far, it works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Willett

customer_reviews.title: Works well, and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well when I used it, My guest slept on it for three nights and said it was comfortable. I did put a 2-inch memory foam topper on it, but would still likely be pretty comfortable without it. Inflated/deflated quickly and easily. It was fairly simple to fold up and put back in the storage bag that came with it, so the deflated bed doesn’t take up much space. When deflating, keep turning on the deflating mechanism to get all air out of it when you’re folding it up.
customer_reviews.author: H. Clyde

customer_reviews.title: Lasted roughly 2.5 years, but valve broke and is now useless
customer_reviews.text: I've had nothing but compliments from guests and have even slept on this myself, but after 2.5 years, it's now broken. There's a big air leak by the "never-flat" rectangular pump. The vinyl's held up fine, but once the mattress is fully inflated, I can hear air hissing out through the three holes at the bottom of the never-flat pump. I tried taping up the three holes, but then air leaks out the red light indicator. Taping up the whole area slows the leak, but I can't get an air tight seal. It had a good run, but I'd hoped to get more than 2.5 years out of an air mattress that was as expensive as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Pontes

customer_reviews.title: The second mattress was fine for the first and only time i used it
customer_reviews.text: Had issues with the first mattress, where the pump didnt work at all. Company was quick to replace it. The second mattress was fine for the first and only time i used it, but by then my actual mattress had arrived and i no longer needed it, so into storage it went. Now a couple years later, i need it and pull it out of storage, and half the bed is blown up like a balloon. Almost completely unusable. But, its outside of the return and warranty period, so what can i really do? Its only been slept on once, however hence my poor review. :(
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Greenia

customer_reviews.title: Great air mattress, didn't go flat through out the night!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this purchase. I had purchased a Coleman air mattress for my guest and it lost air in the middle of the night leaving my guest on the ground. This bed is so much better! Set up was easy and it inflated in less than 5 min. It maintained its firmness through out the night and my guest got the rest they deserved. The automatic Never Flat system is so quiet they didn't hear it go off at all. I was extremely happy I received it before the scheduled time too!
customer_reviews.author: KayBee

customer_reviews.title: Never felt a better purchase than this one!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this air mattress as a replacement for daily use, (although it is not its intended design use per manufacture). Along with this order, I also ordered a foam mattress topper ( and a bamboo mattress topper ( following the recommendations of other users. I set the mattress at firm, topped with the foam topper then, bamboo fiber topper. I got the support for my body as well as the soft-touch feeling for the skin. The combination make this "bed" feel like a very expensive mattress at less than one third of the cost. After three weeks of daily use, I am fully satisfied with the purchase. Never felt a better purchase than this one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Since I got pregnant and had a baby, I had to kick my hubbie out of the bedroom because he snores :) We used other air mattresses, but this one is worth the money. It really does not get flat with that second motor. In fact, when we forgot to unplug it, the secondary motor blew up the mattresses very quietly and lifted the table it was under :)
customer_reviews.author: Anna Varga

customer_reviews.title: Was an awesome Matress until the seal around the controls failed.
customer_reviews.text: It was a Very nice Air Mattress used on the Weekends for when my son would come to visit, but it lasted less then 8 months before it started leaking last week at the bottom of the control panel as shown in the picture. Its holding up because of the inner pump but even the pump at times cant keep up. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bigger guys
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this airbed (queen size) prior to travelling and staying with family. First, let me start by saying I'm 6'6, 220lbs. Obviously I was worried about getting an airbed that would be big enough and could support me. I was shocked at how comfortable this bed is. I slept on it for 5 nights and never had an issue keeping it inflated or staying comfortable. The bed has the pump it uses to inflate and an additional pump that kicks in if it senses the bed is starting to go flat while you're laying on it. It comes in a large carrying bag and is easy to haul around. Definitely would suggest this bed to taller/bigger guys and ladies.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much better than expected! I purchased a "memory foam" topper. Made sleeping on this almost like the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff G.

customer_reviews.title: This bed is GENIUS
customer_reviews.text: Whoever invented this deserves some recognition! I'm a larger person, and often an air mattress will nearly ccompletely deflate under my weight overnight. This is the first one I've used that doesn't. The Never Flat pump makes all the difference. The other really neat thing is that because it relies on a pressure sensor, it can also shut itself off once it's done inflating or deflating. This is great because it means we don't have to babysit the thing while we're setting it up or putting it away.
customer_reviews.author: bengl

customer_reviews.title: Best we've ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this mattress! We've had several air matresses over the years, and this one is by far the best!! Easy to inflate & deflate. Literally Never-Flat! Used it for 2 small boys and they slept really well! Bought this one because of a recommendation from Country Living magazine, and now I recommend this air mattress to everyone I know
customer_reviews.author: Delia

customer_reviews.title: Insta-Bed Air Mattress with Never Flat Pump.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best air mattress I have ever bought. Plugged in, it keeps the mattress filled with air all night. Pump is quiet. My adult children never complain about a bad night's sleep when they stay over. Very good quality. I have had several before this one and they always wound up with a pinhole letting the air out and guests would be on the floor in the morning. This is probably my last purchase of an air mattress.
customer_reviews.author: C. andrew

customer_reviews.title: Super-easy and most comfortable air mattress I've ever slept on!
customer_reviews.text: Super-easy and most comfortable air mattress I've ever slept on! It power-inflates and power-deflates in just a couple minutes. The included tote bag is generously sized so it actually fits in the bag with a less-than-professional/perfect folding job. And the secondary inflator quietly keeps the bed at your desired firmness all throughout the night! I continue to be very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Jason G. Sheperis

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper can be better
customer_reviews.text: This Intex outlasted another one I bought here to replace it, because it was five months old at the time. The one that cost twice as much just blew out on a coil seam with nobody in the room although we heard it and watched it go flat. Now, alas this one is leaking so I'm trying my luck with another brand sporting a 2 year warranty. My advice is, if your on a budget buy this bed, because it is better than many that cost more and last longer than them to.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Solid air mattress with useful features.
customer_reviews.text: This air mattress has been very useful for me when I've had to use it. I use it on medium, have slept on it (by myself) for as many as six nights in a row, and it's been comfortable with no loss of performance. The topping-off feature helps in this regard. As others have noted, it makes about as much noise as a vacuum cleaner while inflating, but it lasts only for about 4 minutes. The cord is a bit twisty, but it's no problem to wind it around your fingers and tuck away.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy + the never-flat feature is terrific
customer_reviews.text: I bought this air mattress about a month ago to replace another (different model) that I’d purchased a few years ago. I’m in the midst of a major home renovation and have been staying in a friend’s basement since late January 2018. I am so happy with this new air mattress, especially in comparison with the prior one (it just deflated one day after 2 months of continual use). The never-flat feature is terrific (I was constantly re-inflating the old air mattress), I find the motor to be quiet. The mattress is stable when I sit on the edge and my queen sized sheets fit on it well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Everything it promised and more
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to purchase the same bed from Frontgate, but it was too pricey. I bought it because my mother was visiting and I let her sleep in my bed. My 65+ mother wanted to sleep on this instead! lol This bed is amazing. It is everything is promises: it inflates quickly, stays firm/med/soft all night, is tall, the night motor is so silent I never heard a thing, and in the morning it was a breeze to put away. Probably the best inflatable bed I have ever purchased and because of the quality I will likely never need to purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Divita's Mom

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE - Secondary pump stopped working after just 8-10 uses!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Insta Raised Queen Bed with Never Flat Pump via Amazon in July, 2014. Initially, this bed seemed to be just what we were looking for... comfortable, inflates and deflates quickly, and seemed to hold air for our guests with the innovative "never flat" pump. Reasonable price for the features. Unfortunately, after just 8-10 uses by single guests, the secondary never-flat pump will no longer shut off. Even after inflating it normally using the primary pump, the never-flat secondary pump instantly turns on and runs indefinitely. It never shuts off!! What's worse, however, is that we contacted Customer Service twice and never heard back regarding the 1-year warranty. BUYER BEWARE.
customer_reviews.author: JavaJoe

customer_reviews.title: Don't leave it plugged in for too long
customer_reviews.text: This is a bit too high off the floor for me. I always thought I would fall off, but never did. Anyway it always seemed on my mind. I found it very comfortable to sleep on. And the 'never flat' feature really does work, but I made a big mistake. I left it plugged in for several weeks. I was away and didn't notice that the bed just kept expanding. When I returned home, it was actually funny to see how far the bed had expanded. But the bed still does work, it just has a much larger footprint.
customer_reviews.author: Dan in Baltimore

customer_reviews.title: Never flat pump
customer_reviews.text: My wife and i bought this product to have in case someone came to say the night at out aparment. We had used this bed for a week at a freinds house when we visited and were very impressed. The never flat pump is so awesome and makes this worth the purchase. I would say that we did come across leaking air around the pump with our freinds bed which was used pretty well. However, we fixed it pretty easily with some caulk around the seems of both pumps and then duct tape over it.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan F.

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up under regular, normal use.
customer_reviews.text: This product was delivered on July 24 2020. Today is October 12, 2020, and the product has an irreparable tear in the material surrounding one of the coils. Totally unacceptable. Use was normal, not over-inflated, not cut by anything sharp - it just pulled away from the coil, making a crescent moon-shaped slice in the material. The "repair kit" that came with the product might as well have been scotch tape - completely ineffective. Extremely disappointed and dissatisfied. That's $100 I'll never get back.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great air mattress.
customer_reviews.text: This was a purchase and return simply because it didn't arrive in time and we ended up having to buy it at a store. The Amazon price was so much better, but the shipping just took too long. I'm still giving the item itself 5 stars, though, because after a night on the floor, we felt like we were sleeping on a feather bed! This is a really good air mattress. I recommend considering a topper for it if it's something that will get much use as the indentations in the mattress after a couple nights on it, get to be uncomfortable. I love the auto-correction for fill, how fast it inflates and deflates.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Leaks air around pump mechanism
customer_reviews.text: Well it started out like a good answer to a temporary situation . . . but then it started to leak air around the pump mechanism 4 months later. It is not the solution to your temporary sleeping issues. There is already a product review with a video doing the exact same thing mine did. So I liked it until it went flat. No amount of monkey glue can fix this piece of ________!
customer_reviews.author: StillHope4MoreChange

customer_reviews.title: Best Blow Up Matress
customer_reviews.text: Works great!! I used this for 5 months after I moved. There is a slight humming noise from the blower, but if I hit the black box, it goes away. It didn't happen all the time and it didn't bother anyone else who slept on it. I left it plugged in all the time and the blower is really quiet. The firm setting was too firm, so I always used the Plush setting. The divets are kinda intense, so after a couple month, I did buy an egg crate foam pad. The deflate option removes all the air for easy storage. I love how you can set it to Plush and it will automatically turn off when done.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Look No Further
customer_reviews.text: Best extra bed ever!!! Was easy and quick to inflate. Love that it will always remain inflated at the setting you like it at. Very comfortable and easy to get in and out of. Our dog and kitten loved the bed as well (did purchase an extra thick mattress cover to go with it). Customer Service was great to work with. They are quick to respond and friendly. Highly recommend if you are looking for a good quality bed.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: Works great - comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Works great - comfortable, functional and made with good materials. If you have limited space and occasional guests, this is a nice solution. Worth the few extra bucks for a good quality product. The built-in electric motor is used both to inflate and deflate. In the morning it deflates and packs away quickly. Important tips: check your room for pins and sharp objects before setup. Also, don't destroy or throw away the clear plastic zipper case that comes with it because it makes for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Nonymous

customer_reviews.title: air unit separated from the mattress
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress and used it in May, June and now the unit that keeps it aired up has separated from the body...I would expect something to last longer than this..and it is not returnable..very disappointed in this product.. For the cost I could have purchased a regular mattress from Ikea and it would still be usable..
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Trebino

customer_reviews.title: Same leaking pump assembly. Product flaw!
customer_reviews.text: Same problem with the leaking around the pump. It is not a hole in the bed, the pump assembly becomes unglued from the rubber bed. No patch will fix that. Of course it is out of the warranty but I only used it 4 or 5 times and I am 175 pounds. It’s a shame because I really liked the bed, comfortable and you wouldn’t wake up on the ground due to it leaking all night. Unusable now after only a handful of uses.
customer_reviews.author: Don Tait

customer_reviews.title: Great Air Mattress That Never Loses Air
customer_reviews.text: Great air mattress that never flattens! My teenage grandson sleeps on it every visit and loves the fact that it never goes flat! He says he sleeps well all night and never hears the bed refilling with air during the night. He is a hefty strong football player and no lightweight on the mattress! I would highly recommend this product and would definitely purchase it again..
customer_reviews.author: Albuquerque Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Regularly develops leaks
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress for just over 7 months now, and I've had to patch over 20 leaks. Not a single puncture, these leaks develop on their own. The seams on the springs split, which causes the secondary pump to run non-stop. As such, it's gone from silent, to nearly as noisy as a vacuum cleaner. The repair patches included with the bed are useless for these leaks, not that there are nearly enough included with the bed for all of them anyway. The location of them prevents the stock patches from sealing. Loctite's "Vinyl, Fabric & Plastic Flexible Adhesive" and a vinyl shower curtain takes care of them, though. tl;dr: I do NOT recommend this mattress to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Fink

customer_reviews.title: Deflated After 1 Year.
customer_reviews.text: I kept this bed inflated for guests in a spare room for a year. It was slept on 7 times. I did like the firmness of it and the quiet motor when it would automatically inflate. I thought this was a good choice as something you could take down and store as need be. However, just after the year warranty was up it completely deflated one day. The hole was right at the seam that holds the main control panel so there was no patching it with the patch kit they provided. To me it was a waste of money and I soon bought a real bed after that.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product For Guests
customer_reviews.text: People will not visit due to the comfortable place now available to sleep. This mattress has to stay plugged in throughout its use to allow the silent never flat motor to work. The system itself is fantastic. You can choose three different firmness settings; Firm, medium, soft. Also the auto inflate and deflate knob is great because it automatically stops once its done. Overall this is a great mattress to offer guest who will repeat visit due to the comfort it provides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used daily for almost 3 years in a household with cats!
customer_reviews.text: This was intended to be a temporary bed for myself between moves, that I would later keep handy for guests. Long story short, I had one of these in daily use for almost 3 years! Finally it began to come apart at the pump. So I bought another one! I have 2 cats with claws, and during that span had just one small puncture which I was able to repair easily with the enclosed repair materials. Please know that a good mattress topper is surely the trick to protecting an air mattress from accidental puncture. This is the one I have that changed my "temporary air mattress" into "sleep heaven" and kept it safe from cat claws.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: air mattress always springs a leak
customer_reviews.text: This mattress came prompty, was very comfortable, liked the quiet pump But within 4 uses the mattress sprung a unrepairable leak do to being put to close to a baseboard. So I throw it away and purchased a second one thinking if I was more careful about setting it up away from the heat it would last. wrong! I woke up at 2 am sleeping on a hammock with a terrible lower backache. I returned the second mattress and will not be buying another air mattress. I am going to try a memory foam fold away.
customer_reviews.author: Dorry Cottrell

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and storage, until it leaked...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: April 2019, after less than 2 years, and light use (less than 15 nights, for sure), the bed broke. The seam where the controls integrate into the mattress has separated, causing a large leak! Original Review: The bed is easy to use, goes up fast, stays inflated, and best of all, the auto-deflate means putting it back away is super simple and fast. I've only used it a couple of times so far (for visiting family and guests) but it has worked great so far. Will update my review after a while to let you know how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: azfatboy

customer_reviews.title: Nice and high off the floor
customer_reviews.text: This is nice and high off the floor. It's easy to get on and off of for us "older folks". I like the self inflating factor - no need to look for that little pump that is hiding somewhere in a drawer. Personally, I don't like to keep it plugged in so it can self inflate when the psi drops. It makes just enough of a background sound to be annoying but that's not a game changer. After the first few uses when the material is "breaking in" it hardly loses any air so you can just give it another little boost the next night to bring it up to where you find it the most comfortable. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Stays inflated, works great.
customer_reviews.text: Slept on this every night for 6 months or so. Eventually it popped, but I'm a heavy guy and crawled in and out multiple times a day. If you're looking for an air-mattress, this is a great one. I put a memory-foam topper on it because it is a bit too firm for my taste, but that's normal with air-mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: Josh T

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last after minimal use.
customer_reviews.text: Although I bought this bed two years ago from Amazon it had been used less than 10 times for guests when we needed an extra bed. Over Thanksgiving we used it and it didn't hold air and the automatic pump didn't kick in. Not sure why..... As we stored it in a closet in the bag it came in. Very disappointed that it didn't last. I bought it because the reviews at the time we bought it were very good but we didn't seem to have the same luck.
customer_reviews.author: Denver, CO

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS MATTRESS
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS MATTRESS!! I bought it to use for a week until I was able to move the rest of my stuff in, but I ended up using it for about 2 months because it's so comfortable. It never lost air (thanks to the never flat technology!) and I would recommend it to anyone in the market for an air mattress! Good to note: the white top collects fuzz and hair like you wouldn't believe, so maybe go with a darker color.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Pump problems
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a great air mattress but 4 months later air started to leak out for around the pump. Brought the two year warranty and they sent me anyone. Got the air mattress and the air was leaking out of the pump again. I don't know if insta bed never flat mean we will always flat because of pump issues or what. Just not worth it. Good I got extra warranty but still had the same issue when I received the new one. It take about two weeks just to get a replacement for the same #### thing. Very angry.
customer_reviews.author: foxann

customer_reviews.title: Nice but smeeellyyyy!
customer_reviews.text: Just about everything about this bed is great, the speed it inflates, deflates, looks, it's very comfortable. I would have gave it 5 stars but the only problem is it stunk up my whole house! I had to put it outside. Hopefully it airs out before I have to put it in a tent next weekend. If you were to put this thing in a tent on day one, I don't know how you would survive the night. I mean come on, you guys can't air these things out a little bit before shipping them out to people?
customer_reviews.author: Luciano Lipari

customer_reviews.title: Burst so soon
customer_reviews.text: I had been lightly using this air mattress for guests and travel off-and-on for months, when on the fourth use it suddenly burst an unpatchable leak in one of the circles on the pillowtop. Neither the included patch kit nor anything else could fix it, and I ended up returning it. The self-inflating feature was nice, and this mattress was slightly more comfortable than a generic camping mattress, but I suggest saving your money and just getting the generic. At the end of the day, it's still an air mattress, and if it's going to leak much better that it's one that you didn't spend extra on for bells and whistles.
customer_reviews.author: Azurielm

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best mattress I have come across. It even came with comfort leveling. Extremely easy to assemble and quick to inflate and deflate. This is the most comfortable inflatable mattress I have ever been on. It is the closes thing to sleeping in your own bed. Well worth the money, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: M. Cramer

customer_reviews.title: So much more comfortable than that old futon!
customer_reviews.text: This was the second inflatable that I purchased this year. The first I returned because its length was shorter than standard. My queen size bottom sheet (18 inch pockets I think) fit snugly which is great. The only time I have heard the never flat pump is when I get out of bed in the morning. Apparently my weight causes the bed to stretch a bit during break in and the bed detects the volume deficit when weight is removed. Some sites recommend using an air mattress only temporarily. Why? I say. With a foam pad under a fitted mattress pad the bed is as comfortable as a mattress, and cheaper and easier to move!
customer_reviews.author: Ian McPhe

customer_reviews.title: Simply EXCELLENT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I LOVE this bed and the company. First one I ordered had a problem with the small pump. Called the company, immediate answer, no hassle replacement. I got this for camping, but since I bought it we have used it twice for me to sleep on when my back is killing me, once for when daughter and son-in-law visited and most recently on a 6 day camping trip. This thing is better than either of the top-of-the-line normal mattresses I have at home, WAY BETTER! My wife agrees. We are seriously considering getting rid of one of our mattresses and using one of these instead as our full time bed. It is that good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had this mattress for a month and had a rip ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this mattress for a month and had a rip in one of the coil circles, right on the seam! NOTHING BUT PROBLEMS WITH THIS MATTRESS!!! COIL CIRCLES DO NOT HAVE ENOUGH SUPPORT!!! PATCH UPON PATCH TO REPAIR!!! THIS WAS A TOTAL WASTE OF MONEY!!!!! TOTALLY RIDICULOUS WASTE OF MONEY!!! DO NOT BUY THIS MATTRESS UNLESS YOU WANT TO SPEND ALL YOUR TIME PATCHING IT. THIS MATTRESS HAS SO MANY PATCHES I COULD HAVE BOUGHT A COMPLETE BEDROOM SET WITH THE MONEY I SPENT ON PATCHES!!!!! TOO BAD I HAD TO GIVE A 1 STAR RATING! I AM TIRED OF WAKING UP ON THE FLOOR!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ShawnB

customer_reviews.title: Take your chances.
customer_reviews.text: Gave it 3 stars because after the first time it leaked they replaced it free of charge even after it was just outside the return window. First one lasted 13 months. Second one made it almost a year and neither were slept on regularly. Originally purchased for my nephew who only visited on weekends and was also used by company from Germany. It really WAS comfortable and easy to inflate. But both leaked around the same spot. There is obviously a design flaw. We’re just gonna break down and buy a box spring and mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The automatic re-inflating mechanism stopped working several months in. ...
customer_reviews.text: The automatic re-inflating mechanism stopped working several months in. We have found that no inflatable mattresses work for that long. We use on for extra bedding in our AirBnB apartment and no matter the brand, we have to buy new ones every year or so. They are not used constantly but probably more frequently than when you have them for a random guest. Our problem is how to recycle them.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Hunt

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with how large the bed is and it comfortably ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bed to be primarily used as a guest bed when family and friends come into town. I'm happy with how large the bed is and it comfortably sleeps two people. While the "never flat" system seems to work well, the adjustment ring that controls the function can be a bit finicky and I occasionally have to turn it *just* right to get the motor to kick on. Once it's set correctly it doesn't appear to need further adjustment, even if the bed is inflated for several days at a time.
customer_reviews.author: K. Schaller

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't hold air
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bed because years prior to this I owned one just like it. As soon as I recieved the bed I took it out and inflated it. Well to my dismay the bed wouldn't stay inflated. I couldn't find a hole nor could I hear air excapeing. I noticed then that the backup pump was not kicking on. I tried several days to continue inflating it and it still would not stay up so I contacted Amazon and they immediatly took care of the return. I am planning on ordering one more air bed like this to give them one more try. I hope it works because I loved the first one we had.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Never Flat Indeed
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only used it once, but it was fantastic. Not only does it stay inflated all night, but it actually uses a smaller, quieter pump to do it. ON TOP of that, it also lets you set the firmness that you want the smaller pump to maintain. All around fantastic mattress. *Note, we do use it with a memory foam topper, so I can’t speak to comfort, but it’s pretty comparable to most air mattresses in that department.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Great performance and value.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this earlier in the year for guests and travel. So far, it has seen about 15 nights of use by anyone from one small kid to two adults. It has performed flawlessly each time. Inflation and deflation is loud - think loud vacuum cleaner - but it only takes a couple minutes and stops automatically. The Never Flat pump is really quiet; I think I heard it going maybe once in the 3 nights I've personally used the mattress. Everyone who uses it notes how comfortable it is--far better than crashing on a pull-out sofa or futon. It seems fairly priced, especially if it ever happens to save you the cost of a hotel room.
customer_reviews.author: PJT

customer_reviews.title: Inflates/deflates quickly; maintains inflation level all night
customer_reviews.text: We had our daughter and son-in-law over and we were short of beds. This fit the bill nicely. They both slept soundly. I like the fact that we can get it either inflated or deflated pretty quickly, without having to connect/disconnect an external air pump. Looks pretty solid, so hopefully it will give us years of service.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory L. Meece

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid air mattress. I've had several guests use it, and I've used it myself a few times, with no issues. Never had any back/neck problems or anything like that. You can adjust the setting of the firmness you want, and it will adjust accordingly without being intrusive at all. I'm giving it 4 stars because I don't think I can honestly give any air mattress 5 stars unless it just completely blew me away, but I do highly recommend it. It is an excellent thing to have for your primary or secondary guest room.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great Return Policy
customer_reviews.text: I used this one time and it was amazing and when I pulled it out to use it again it would not stay inflated. However, I have changed my Stars to 5 because customer service was excellent. I filled out the warranty and received a reply next day. I just had to take photos of the pump being cut out and they sent me a new mattress that arrived in 4 days. Hassle free returns and the new one works great. Used for a week straight for family in town.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad valves
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my sons spare room for when we visit. Only used 5 or 6 times. Not used since Christmas and last night it went flat on us. Air comes out of the value faster than the pump can fill it up. Really disappointed in this and we almost bought another one. Now have to look for a better insta bed.
customer_reviews.author: Alys Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Auto pump stopped working after ~10 uses
customer_reviews.text: I used this bed about 5 times, followed the instructions and made sure it was plugged into a 120 outlet and the bed does not continually add air when it starts to get flat, the auto air pump does not work anymore. I would definitely like my money back or be sent a new bed. It was great when it worked but I bought this bed for when I visit my grand daughter across the U.S. Now I have nothing to use. It's not fun waking up with your bottom on the floor. There is no hole anywhere, the auto pump just doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Debra R. Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for a spare inflatable bed
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most inflatable beds I have had experience with in the past, this one has not lost any air in the ten days since I first inflated it. The height off the floor is about 18" which makes it very easy to climb out of. Although that depth is a bit more than the "deep pocket" fitted sheets that are available, it is easy to get on a fitted sheet by attaching it while the mattress is semi-deflated and then inflating it to your preference. There are separate settings for adjusting from "firm" to "soft," ehich is a nice touch. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Vonhandorf

customer_reviews.title: 6 years of reliable service
customer_reviews.text: Used it for 6 years...for grandchildren when visiting. Once or twice a year for a week long stay. May of 2014. Stopped maintaining bed inflation this week. Must be the secondary pump that failed as mentioned in previous reviews. Not a lot of usage. I think it should have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: TaWanda Sharon

product_meta.title: Insta-Bed Raised Air Mattress with Never Flat Pump
product_meta.description: The Insta-Bed Raised Air Bed with Never Flat™ technology makes getting into and out of bed easier and just might be the most comfortable air bed you've ever slept on. Able to maintain it's pressure throughout the night, Never Flat™ elimates sagging and loss of air pressure that is so common in airbeds. Never Flat™ technology is an auto-engaging, whisper quiet pump that maintains constant air pressure throughout the night for an undisturbed, continuous night's rest that is never flat. Choose your desired comfort level--Plush, Medium, or Firm--and let the powerful Primary Pump inflate the bed. Once inflated, the Secondary Pump continusly monitors and senses when it needs to silently engage in order to maintain the chosen comfort level throughout the night. *The powerful, integrated primary pump enables effortless inflation and deflation of the air bed. *The automatic shut-off feature turns the Primary Pump once the bed is fully inflated or deflated, allowing you to turn on the pump and walk away without worrying about the pump getted burned out. *Clear dial settings for plush, medium, and firm allow for preferred personal mattress comfort levels. *Pressure sensing technology constantly monitors and adjusts to match the chosen mattress comfort level. *Pump silently, as neccessary, engages throughout the night creating a consistently comfortable feel. *21 circular coils on the Twin Bed and 35 circular coils on the Queen Bed create a comfortable sleeping surface while vertical and horizontal reinforcements allow bed to maintain shape. *Flocked top keeps bedding in place. *Carry bag included. Guaranteed to stay inflated all night!
feature_bullets: Crafted from the highest quality material
Perfect for outdoor and even indoor use
Two pumps in one bed. The patented neverFLAT pump system silently keeps your airbed inflated all night. Guaranteed!

The primary pump automatically inflates and deflates your airbed in less than 4 minutes. The secondary neverFLAT Pump monitors and silently maintains the air pressure to your desired comfort level while you sleep. Convenient auto-shutoff feature on primary pump automatically turns the pump system off when the airbed is fully inflated or deflated
35 circular coils on the Queen size and 21 circular coils on the Twin size create a strong, supportive, and level sleep surface
18" raised height makes getting into and out of bed easier; Included carry bag for convenient storage and travel

Please inflate your mattress according to the included instructions. Note that the material may stretch during the first several uses. It is recommended to inflate your bed at least 1 hour prior to using or measuring it. Extra air may be required after this period to achieve full firmness. For items featuring the NeverFLAT pump system, this extra air is added automatically. All mattress measurements should be taken from the center of the bed surface. For width and length, measure across the bed from the center of each side from widest point to widest point. For the height, measure at the center of the longest side from the ground to the highest point of the bed surface.
Questions? Please email our Customer Service Team at help@americanrec.com or by phone Monday-Friday 9 AM - 5 PM CST at 1-800-325-4121

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
